title: Coinbase fixes 2FA log error making people think they were hacked
summary: Coinbase has fixed a confusing bug in its account activity logs that caused users to think their credentials were compromised. [...]

title: Brave's Cookiecrumbler tool taps community to help block cookie notices
summary: Brave has open-sourceed a new tool called "Cookiecrumbler," which uses large language models (LLMs) to detect cookie consent notices and then community-driven reviews to block those that won't break site functionality. [...]
